author: potuz
content: A little update, the gossip interop with Teku is stable finally, it's finalizing without trouble after we fixed the mostly static problems we had (Prysm was using hacked up types for attestations for example, that were enough to get the single client interop  to finalize).  We still have some work to do on this interop (discussion in the thread above) but after that I'll focus in reviewing if <@520034910149410861>'s proposal is equivalent or not to the current one with different boosts and update the CL spec to the version we are running in the devnet that is simpler
